text: Your best friend and worst enemy are both in this room right now. It's not your neighbor right or left - and it's not God or the devil - it's you.
author: Edwin Louis Cole

text: Men at most differ as Heaven and Earth, but women, worst and best, as Heaven and Hell.
author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

text: And it is still true, no matter how old you are, when you go out into the world it is best to hold hands and stick together.
author: Robert Fulghum

text: I'm human, I'm not perfect. I make mistakes all the time, but I guess my job is to keep those mistakes to myself, which I'm already fine doing and just try to be the best I can be for those kids.
author: Selena Gomez

text: Maria is the best reason to come home.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
